Posts.EditableText:
This was my first encouter with textadventure and creating a game on quest.
I created a gamebook game online, and need to publish the game or get it to work online, but not sure how to go about.  There is no option to save it, so I am stuck.If I copy the link, and try to share it on a app like padlet, it gives an error.  Please assist.
Posts.HTML:
This was my first encouter with textadventure and creating a game on quest.
I created a gamebook game online, and need to publish the game or get it to work online, but not sure how to go about. There is no option to save it, so I am stuck.If I copy the link, and try to share it on a app like padlet, it gives an error. Please assist.

Posts.EditableText:
Are you using the online editor, or the downloaded one?

If you're using Quest in your web browser, then when you click the "Create" button at the top of the site, you'll see a list of all your games with "Edit", "Play", "Publish", "Download", and "Delete" buttons. Press "Publish".

If you downloaded Quest for Windows, then you need to use the publish function to create a `.quest` file, which you can then upload to this site. ("Create" → "Upload Game")
Posts.HTML:
Are you using the online editor, or the downloaded one?

If you're using Quest in your web browser, then when you click the "Create" button at the top of the site, you'll see a list of all your games with "Edit", "Play", "Publish", "Download", and "Delete" buttons. Press "Publish".

If you downloaded Quest for Windows, then you need to use the publish function to create a .quest file, which you can then upload to this site. ("Create" → "Upload Game")
